name: Steven Rowell
what_you_do: Strategic Speaker Institute provides coaching and consulting services for speakers, consultants, and coaches to help them secure high-paying corporate engagements and build recurring income through structured frameworks and personalized guidance.
who_you_serve: The target audience includes speakers, consultants, and coaches looking to enhance their business and income through effective strategies and support.
current_projects: Free 20-minute coaching sessions available for potential clients.
bio: Steven Rowell has consulted with 24 Fortune 500 companies and has authored multiple best-selling books with over 214,000 copies distributed worldwide.
business_focus: Strategic Speaker Institute provides coaching and consulting services for speakers, consultants, and coaches to help them secure high-paying corporate engagements and build recurring income through structured frameworks and personalized guidance.
